Text: I downloaded episode 1, the audio is Japanese and the subs are embedded (you can't get rid of them).

The English is all over and horribly done compared to this. Thanks for the up. I knew they released the original TV show dub in JP for the first time not too long ago but I could not find it for purchase, streamed or for dl anywhere. Nice to have a professional job that is not mindnumblingly wooden.
